extendedInfo.description: "Have Your Say" allows you to interact with Andrew Laming MP, Liberal Member of the seat of Bowman in QLD, Australia. You can communicate directly with Andrew and provide your opinion on the issues that matter to you, simply by responding to any of the questions that are being asked in "Have Your Say".Let Andrew know, not just what you think most importantly how you feel about an issue that matters to you.As well as being able to express your opinion you can also see Andrew's videos, news-links, twitter feed, and Facebook.The App also shows easy options on how to get in touch directly with Andrew.Why sit on the side-line when you can actually be part of what's happening!This is Democracy in action - in fact if the ancient Greeks had invented this app they probably would have called it.... "Have Your Say"Andrew Laming's "Have Your Say" App is brought to you by the leaders in political interactive communication PMI (Political Media International), using the very latest unparalleled technology from iPowow!
